resources.string: Choose and Edit Existing Stock to enter Final Price
Enter the Closing Date in format (dd-mm-yyyy)

Welcome to Stock Recorder where we provide with you with the Tools to record your Portfolio Gains! 
 To add a new Stock simply go to "Add New Stock" on the homepage than enter required information and Submit! 
 To View Existing Stocks simply go to "Edit And View Existing Stocks" where you can edit and view current entries! 
 In the View Existing Stocks it will allow you do close out a stock
 On the Home Page we will display for you your current portfolio gains! 
 Good luck making that Money!
